actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk makes one Bite attack and one Ritual Staff attack, or it makes two Swamp Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Ritual Staff
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Swamp Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The lizardfolk shaman casts one of the following spells, using WIS as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13).
At will: _druidcraft_, _guidance_, _mending_
2/day each: _cure wounds_, _entangle_, _grease_
1/day: _ray of enfeeblement_

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell and Taste
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk's Perception is 20 when perceiving by smell or taste.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The lizardfolk shaman can hold its breath for 15 minutes.
